objects.text:
• Ultra-soft canvas with brown accents
• SpaceWalk 3-layered sole system
• Roomy toe box for comfort
• Lightweight cushioning

product_details.name: X Lows CORTADO
product_details.description:
- The Cortado is a study in perfect ratios.
- Like its namesake Spanish coffee, the pristine white canvas flows like steamed milk, while rich brown accents cut through with the boldness of rich, crema-topped espresso, same as a baristas pour.Bold yet smooth, the Cortado is a daily essential brewed to perfection. - Ever-soft and ever-snug grip- Roomy toe box lets our broad Indian toes breathe.- Irresistible comfort, thanks to SpaceWalk, our signature 3-layered sole system.
- SpaceWalk is light, airy, and cloud-like, and is named so for all the right reasons.
- What you'll be stepping into is a long-lasting insole placed on top of an ultra-cushioned sheet of foam found in running shoes.
- The sheet is then housed inside a light-weight rubber outsole for sturdiness, making this a go-to choice for everything from morning walks to house party nights.
- SpaceWalks grooves and textures let you land on your feet in style with zero slip and max abrasion resistance.
- Materials:Upper: Canvas with Microfiber UnderlayFootbed: Synthetic LeatherSole: Rubber, EVA

banner_details:
This banner features a stylish product promotion with a modern layout using a diagonal two-tone background split. The upper-left section has a light beige gradient, while the lower-right offers a rich brown gradient forming a sleek contrast. At the top-left, bold uppercase headlines (referenced by `heading_1` and `heading_2`) introduce the product with strong, display-style typography. Below, `subheading` provides a compelling descriptor in a serif typeface. The features list (`description`) follows in a clean sans-serif font, aligned left for readability. Bottom-left presents the price (`price`) in bold typographic style, with a dark button (`cta_background`) labeled by `cta`. A sneaker product image (`product_image`) is stylishly tilted on the lower-right section. The banner includes subtle circular design elements for texture. 

**Color Palette:**
- Light Beige: `#e6d7c3`
- Warm Taupe: `#d4c1a9`
- Rich Brown: `#6e5642`
- Deep Coffee Brown: `#4A3728`
- White: `#ffffff`
product_color: The product image features a sneaker with a neutral and earthy color palette, ideal for a minimalist advertisement banner. The primary color is a soft Cream Beige (#F5F0E6), which covers the upper canvas body, evoking understated elegance. Accents in Chocolate Brown (#5A3E2B) are used for the laces, outsole, and logo outline, adding contrast and structure. The outsole blends seamlessly with a muted Tan (#D9CBB6), forming a smooth transition that maintains harmony without sharp breaks. The star logo in White (#FFFFFF) stands out distinctly, offering a pop of brightness. Together, these colors create a balanced look with warmth, depth, and a refined modern aesthetic.
